verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came יוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> Then Joseph וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְפַרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אָבִ֨י <S%H1><s%> My father וְאַחַ֜י <S%H251><s%> and my brethren וְצֹאנָ֤ם <S%H6629><s%> and their flocks וּבְקָרָם֙ <S%H1241><s%> and their herds וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לָהֶ֔ם בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and all that they have are come out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְהִנָּ֖ם <S%H2005><s%> are in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and behold they [are] in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen

וּמִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> some אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> of his brethren לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> [even] five אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> men וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם <S%H3322><s%> and presented לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> them unto פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם <S%H4639><s%> act וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh רֹעֵ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> are shepherds צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> cattle עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servants גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> both we [and] also our fathers

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> They said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> moreover unto Pharaoh לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> For to sojourn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> in the land בָּאנוּ֒ <S%H935><s%> are we come כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מִרְעֶ֗ה <S%H4829><s%> have no pasture לַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> for their flocks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> your לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servants כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> [is] sore הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> for the famine בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֵֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> dwell נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> now therefore we pray thee let thy servants בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָבִ֥יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father וְאַחֶ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> and thy brethren בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [is] before thee הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּמֵיטַ֣ב <S%H4315><s%> in the best הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> to dwell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֶ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> and brethren יֵשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> let them dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> know וְיֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> any בָּם֙ אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> men חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of activity וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם <S%H7760><s%> among them then make them שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> rulers מִקְנֶ֖ה <S%H4735><s%> over my cattle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לִֽי׃

וַיָּבֵ֤א <S%H935><s%> brought in יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ <S%H5975><s%> and set him לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob כַּמָּ֕ה <S%H4100><s%> How יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> age שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8141><s%> years חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> age

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> The days שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> of the years מְגוּרַ֔י <S%H4033><s%> of my pilgrimage שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [are] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> few וְרָעִ֗ים <S%H7451><s%> and evil הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> have been יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> have the days שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> of the years חַיַּ֔י <S%H2416><s%> of my life וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> been and have not attained אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> unto the days שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> of the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> of the life אֲבֹתַ֔י <S%H1><s%> of my fathers בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4033><s%> of their pilgrimage

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and went out מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from before פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh

וַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> placed יוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָיו֒ <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H14><s%> would לָהֶ֤ם אֲחֻזָּה֙ <S%H272><s%> them a possession בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּמֵיטַ֥ב <S%H4315><s%> in the best הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land רַעְמְסֵ֑ס <S%H7486><s%> of Rameses כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> as Pharaoh

וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל <S%H3557><s%> nourished יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> household אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> and all his father's לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> with bread לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according הַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> to [their] families

וְלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> And [there was] no bread אֵין֙ <S%H369><s%> now there בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because כָבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> sore הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> for the famine מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [was] very וַתֵּ֜לַהּ <S%H3856><s%> fainted אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> so that the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and [all] the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> by reason הָרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> of the famine

וַיְלַקֵּ֣ט <S%H3950><s%> gathered up יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> all the money הַנִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> that was found בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּבְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בַּשֶּׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> for the corn אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> they שֹׁבְרִ֑ים <S%H7666><s%> which they bought וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the money בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> house פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> into Pharaoh's

וַיִּתֹּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> failed הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> And when money מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the land כְּנַעַן֒ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <S%H935><s%> came כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> Give לָּ֣נוּ לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> us bread וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why נָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> for why should we die נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5048><s%> about כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָפֵ֖ס <S%H656><s%> faileth כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> in thy presence? for the money

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give מִקְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4735><s%> your cattle וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִקְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4735><s%> you for your cattle אִם־ <S%H518><s%> since אָפֵ֖ס <S%H656><s%> fail כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> if money

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵיהֶם֮ <S%H4735><s%> their cattle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵף֒ <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶם֩ יוֹסֵ֨ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them bread בַּסּוּסִ֗ים <S%H5483><s%> [in exchange] for horses וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> and for the cattle הַצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> and for the flocks וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> for all their cattle הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> of the herds וּבַחֲמֹרִ֑ים <S%H2543><s%> and for the asses וַיְנַהֲלֵ֤ם <S%H5095><s%> and he fed בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> them with bread בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all מִקְנֵהֶ֔ם <S%H4735><s%> their livestock בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> for that year הַהִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַתִּתֹּם֮ <S%H8552><s%> was ended הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> When that year הַהִוא֒ <S%H1931><s%> they וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> also hath בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> unto him the second וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is nothing נְכַחֵ֣ד <S%H3582><s%> unto him We will not hide מֵֽאֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> [it] from my lord כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo תַּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> is spent הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> how that our money וּמִקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> our herds הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> of cattle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> my lord לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> is nothing נִשְׁאַר֙ <S%H7604><s%> there is not ought left לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the sight אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> of my lord בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> because אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo גְּוִיָּתֵ֖נוּ <S%H1472><s%> but our bodies וְאַדְמָתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H127><s%> and our lands

לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why נָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> Wherefore shall we die לְעֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> before thine eyes גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> both אַדְמָתֵ֔נוּ <S%H127><s%> us and our land קְנֵֽה־ <S%H7069><s%> attain אֹתָ֥נוּ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H127><s%> and we and our land בַּלָּ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> for bread וְנִֽהְיֶ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וְאַדְמָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H127><s%> that the land עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> will be servants לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וְתֶן־ <S%H5414><s%> and give זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> [us] seed וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <S%H2421><s%> that we may live וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not נָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> and not die וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> and our land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵשָֽׁם׃ <S%H3456><s%> be not desolate
